task.title: Custom Fonts with Better Web Help
task.shortdesc: How to customize the fonts with output from the Better Web Help (bwh) DITA OT plugin.

taskbody.context: This tutorial assumes that you have already built the website using the DITA OT.

step.cmd: Open the output directory that you supplied to the DITA OT.
You will see a comment at the top describing the classes and ids to specify to change a specific region:
Using the syntax below, enter the desired fonts.

taskbody.result: You can use this document to customize other stylings as well.The fonts on your web-help should now be changed. Note that if you rebuild the project to the same output directory, your custom fonts will remain. The build will not overwrite your user-fonts.css file.
